title: So many reasons to fly
content:
Hello all,

I am looking for another font. I thought Neo Sans or Netto OT would be a good match but they don't come close at all.  
Does someone recognize the following font:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055402im_/http:/typophile.com/files/somanyreasons_6432.png)

Escuse the bad quality and the perspective but I couldn't gather much better images.

Thanks for your input!  
-C

Font: 

 Exo 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055402/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [somanyreasons.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055402/http:/typophile.com/files/somanyreasons.png) | 16.39 KB |
author: detaildude

comments.content:
Not an exact match, but it looks very close to **[Play](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055402/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=Play%20-%20Regular&fid=caf6ce847a7441c579e0ce2e47a11fd3&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=So%20many%20reasons%20to%20fly&wrap=2)** by Jonas Hecksher [Playtype, 2011, part of Google Web Fonts]  
The main differences are |y| branch and curly bottom of |l|
Good find Ryuk, I think you are right ;)

Thanks Ryuk and fvilanakis! :)

Exo looks like the correct choice. I already planned to use KlavikaBasic as alternate but Exo suits perfectly.
